summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 5, Thompson's Unviersity Addition, being the alley between 16th Avenue Northeast and 17th Avenue Northeast, from East 56th Street to 16th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9667 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
